name: Reduced style - for Aero (W7)
description:
- removes Firefox app button (*)
- reduces the size of tabs
- tabs on the top of the window (always = also if not maximized) when tabs are on top
> or <
- navagation bar on the top of the window when tabs aren't on top
additional_info:
For full effect you have to restart Firefox.

(*) Please disable main manubar (as if you want app button to be displayed) - if not, there won't be some elements displayed (the primary function of this code is to hide the app button). The main menubar is possible to display for a while by pressing F10 or Alt key on your keyboard. It's standard behaviour, but I mention it because it can be useful fo you-when you know it, you don't need the main menubar or big orange button displayed all the time.

I am working on non-Aero version for WinXP. After this will be done (and also above mentioned "problem" solved) I want to release all as one independent add-on (.xpi).

If you have any idea for improvement, don't hesitate to contact me. I will be very grateful for your feedback.
